name: MDNA - My Desktop Network Address
short_description:
Utility to analyse the network addresses and configure them. This project has just started, so even if it is in pre-alpha version is considered to be  immature and not ready to be used in a production environment.
This work is a simple programming exercise written by the Sardinian  transhumanist philosopher  and writer Luigi Usai. This work in progress is intended just for fun and will be converted in as many programming languages ​​as possible to allow  the porting of the application on as many operating systems as possible.
At the same time is to be considered as a kind of programming exercise to keep in training. Don't use it in a working environment! Have fun.
summary: Utility to analyse the network addresses and configure them
